amendment.description: Amendment requires the TSA to include on the No Fly List any individual who was a detainee held at the Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, unless the President certifies in writing to Congress that the detainee poses no threat to the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to secure aviation from extreme terrorist threats.
